item.description:
Have a busy week planned...why not meet and start the week off with friends, old and new. We're sitting, relaxing, drinking some wine, sharing a bite. Come out and join us.

A casual way to spend the afternoon, we will be hanging out at everyone's favorite place...great views...nice comfortable fireplace...good conversation...what could be better.

Bring a dish, an appetizer, a snack...to share. Bring a smile, and a warm heart. And I will see you all there!

PLEASE NOTE: THIS IS OUR FIRST STOP ON THE CT WINE TRAIL. WON'T YOU JOIN US AS WE MAKE THE JOURNEY?
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri or the Meetup sign...Cell is 203-808-5829

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Gouveia Vineyards...1st on the list for THE CT WINE TRAIL...
